content.en: Hyperspectral image compression: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the compression of hyperspectral images. These algorithms, such as the JPEG2000 standard, wavelets, discrete cosine transform, and Karhunen-Loève transform, are being used to find the optimal tradeoff between image classification performance and compression. Other approaches include correlation coefficients adaptive coding, Kalman filter prediction, and hybrid transform coding. The goal is to develop efficient compression methods that can preserve important information while reducing the size of hyperspectral images.
content.da: Hyperspektral billedekomprimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre komprimeringen af hyperspektrale billeder. Disse algoritmer, såsom JPEG2000-standarden, wavelets, diskret cosinus transform og Karhunen-Loève transform, bliver brugt til at finde det optimale kompromis mellem billedklassifikationsydelse og komprimering. Andre tilgange inkluderer korrelationskoefficients adaptiv kodning, Kalman filter forudsigelse og hybrid transform coding. Målet er at udvikle effektive komprimeringsmetoder, der kan bevare vigtig information, samtidig med at størrelsen af de hyperspektrale billeder reduceres.
